recipe.title: Rosemary Spuds
recipe.ingredient: 1-2 Red skin potatoes per person cut in 1/4 length ways
recipe.step: Preheat oven to 180C, while you prepare spuds.
In a large baking dish place all ingredients except the salt, and turn over with your hands to coat everything.
Place in oven for 1 hour, turning every 15 minutes to cook evenly.
Once cooked sprinkle with salt and turn over with spatula to spread evenly.
Ideally served with lamb and a green salad.
